backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access control, Stripe integration, player profiles, daily limits, location distance checks, AR spot claims, and utility methods for user roles and profile access.
CAPACITOR_BUILD_GUIDE.md: Empty file placeholder for build instructions.
CAPACITOR_MOBILE_GUIDE.md: Empty file placeholder for mobile setup instructions.
capacitor.config.ts: Empty file placeholder for Capacitor configuration.
DEEP_LINKING_SETUP.md: Empty file placeholder for deep linking configuration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and test IDs for institutional content expansion and layout improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of major frontend files and systems.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, favicon, and root mount for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App routing setup using TanStack Router with theme provider and all institutional and AR-related page routes.
frontend/src/components/ARSpotModal.tsx: Empty placeholder component for AR spot modal.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Empty placeholder component for bottom navigation UI.
frontend/src/components/CoinInfoBottomPa: Empty placeholder component for coin info bottom panel.
frontend/src/components/CollectionComple: Empty placeholder component for collection completion banner.
frontend/src/components/EnergyBar.tsx: Empty placeholder component for energy bar UI.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, contact links, documentation URL, and compliance messaging using language context.
frontend/src/components/GameFooter.tsx: Empty placeholder component for in‑game footer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders a multilingual site header with navigation links, external Gold Paper link, language toggle, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/InstitutionalExp: Displays a styled section with a disclaimer banner and localized conceptual-content warnings, wrapping provided child content.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with language context and renders the header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a PT/EN language context with persistent storage and navigation/footer translations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, black/gold theming, animations, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a multilingual About page with AR metaverse descriptions and three feature cards using dynamic language content.
frontend/src/pages/ARDistributionPage.ts: Displays a localized global AR distribution page with map, regional stats, and styled visuals.
frontend/src/pages/BancoCentral.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Colecao.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a multilingual contact page with helpdesk and website links using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/DAO.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DAOPage.tsx: Provides a detailed multilingual conceptual DAO governance model with roles, proposal types, and disclaimers.
frontend/src/pages/Distribuicao.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/GameSystemsPage.tsx: Shows multilingual descriptions of core game systems like energy, XP, monster capture, and GPS token mechanics.
frontend/src/pages/GoldPaper.tsx: Displays multilingual Gold Paper info and auto-redirects users to a documentation canister with a manual access button.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the animated homepage with language toggle, rotating text, and an install CTA for the app.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, branding, CTA button, and institutional resource highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Legal compliance page showing GDPR, MiCA, KYC information with bilingual content and conceptual clarification notes.
frontend/src/pages/MapMode.tsx: Empty placeholder page for map mode.
frontend/src/pages/PresalePage.tsx: Displays presale structure with language‑based titles and images showing presale phases and progress.
frontend/src/pages/PreVendaQTM.tsx: Empty placeholder presale page in Portuguese.
frontend/src/pages/QTMRules.tsx: Empty placeholder page for QTM rules.
frontend/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx: Roadmap page showing 2026 milestones per quarter with bilingual support and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalPage.tsx: Technical architecture page describing canister structure, roles, compliance notes, and conceptual-only components.
frontend/src/pages/TokenomicsPage.tsx: Tokenomics page showing QMY supply, distribution, and extensive conceptual expansion notes with interactive allocation highlighting.
frontend/src/pages/TreasuryMonetaryPolic: Bilingual React page defining conceptual treasury, vesting, deflation policy, and timelines with strong disclaimers.
UI page showing vesting and deflation graphics with bilingual titles and icons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL/query parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, features, issues, and repo scope.
public/.well-known/apple-app-site-associ: Empty file placeholder for iOS universal links configuration.
public/.well-known/assetlinks.json: Empty placeholder for Android app links configuration.
